name: RURAL COMMUNITIES ASSISTANCE PARTNERSHIP
description: National network of non-profit organizations providing support to rural communities.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to water infrastructure including America's Water Infrastructure Act of 2020 (S. 3591), Drinking Water Infrastructure Act of 2020 (S. 3590), The Voluntary Water Partnership for Distress
